Desc.entry: Annual festival event for the local community and visitors. Held at the Millennium Park and various other venues (Heeley City Farm, Christ Church and Anns Grove School) on the 3rd Saturday in June. Organised by Heeley Entertainment and Activities Team (HEAT) in conjunction with Heeley Development Trust, Ann's Grove School, Heeley City Farm, Heeley Church and local residents.

Pubs.entry: New Heeley Voice, newsletter; Leaflets; Posters
